titleStmt.title: By the Queene the Queenes Maiestie vnderstanding that there bee certaine persons hauing in times past the office of ministery to the church ... hereby Her Highnesse doth charge and command ... that they doe forbeare to preach ... other then the Gospells and Epistels ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.
